CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 22, 1946, pg. 32, reads: "Eyeing Coveted Trophy Again - Members of the United Negro College Fund committee of Kaufmann's Department Store look on as the Rev. Roy Brentley, chairman, and Dr. F. D. Patterson admire the trophy won by the employes [employees] of Kaufmann's two successive years for their participation in annual College Fund drive. The group held its kick-off meeting recently to formulate plans and stimulate their fund-raising program for this year. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of United Negro College Fund committee of Kaufmann's Department store, including Rev. Roy Brentley and Dr. F. D. Patterson with trophy, posed in interior with leaf patterned carpeting
